import math
t = int(input())
while t > 0:
    n = int(input())
    L = list(map(int, input().split()))
    l = 1
    r = n
    l_count = 0
    r_count = 0
    all_count = 0
    for i in L:
        l_count += i != l
        r_count += i != r
        all_count += i != l and i != r
        l += 1
        r -= 1
    l_count -= all_count
    r_count -= all_count
    if l_count + all_count <= r_count:
        print('First')
    elif r_count + all_count < l_count:
        print('Second')
    else:
        print('Tie')
    t -= 1
